EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Guys, Just wanted to add Scott’s Business Manager at MBO, Nicolette Taylor, to this thread. Thanks,Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Paul Shahady [mailto:pashahady@aol.com] Sent: Thursday, July 12, 2012 7:34 AM To: scotthall@woh.rr.com Cc: Sara Conde; jean.james@seniorexecutiveservices.com; bill.james@seniorexecutiveservices.com Subject: Re: SES LLC Overview Scott, Since you are already an associate of MBO Partners, the process to work as an SES LLC consultant was easy. It may take several weeks before we get your photo and bio on the web, but you can begin using the SES LLC business card and LinkedIn reference now. I've attached a power point template for you to add your pertinent info and begin using now. I got mine made at Kinkos across from Wright State University. Let your current MBO Partners business associate know that you are now working through SES LLC. Paul Shahady pashahady@aol.com <mailto:pashahady@aol.com>-----Original Message----- From: Scott <scotthall@woh.rr.com <mailto:scotthall@woh.rr.com>> To: 'Paul Shahady' <pashahady@aol.com <mailto:pashahady@aol.com>> Sent: Wed, Jul 11, 2012 7:25 am Subject: RE: SES LLC OverviewThanks for the power point Paul. When will I be allowed to include SES LLC to my LinkedIn Profile and when will you provide me with the business card template? Scott From: Paul Shahady [mailto:pashahady@aol.com <mailto:pashahady@aol.com?>] Sent: Tuesday, July 10, 2012 8:56 PM To: scotthall@woh.rr.com <mailto:scotthall@woh.rr.com> Subject: Fwd: SES LLC Overview Had the wrong email address.Paul Shahady pashahady@aol.com <mailto:pashahady@aol.com>-----Original Message----- From: Paul Shahady <pashahady@aol.com <mailto:pashahady@aol.com>> To: scotthall <scotthall@wohrr.com <mailto:scotthall@wohrr.com>> Sent: Mon, Jul 9, 2012 4:17 pm Subject: SES LLC OverviewSorry it took so long.Paul Shahady pashahady@aol.com <mailto:pashahady@aol.com>
